name: Checks or electronic funds transfers in lieu of warrants
text: §40-51.5  Checks or electronic funds transfers in lieu of warrants.  With reference to warrants addressed under this part, the comptroller may, with the approval of the director of finance, issue checks drawn from, or make electronic funds transfers from, depositories of state treasury moneys in lieu of warrants drawn from the state treasury. [L 1993, c 46, §1; am L 1997, c 188, §3]
